website_summaries.verdict: One of the best options for a complete set of dock lines for multiple or large craft.
pros: Dock line set comes with 4 separate lines of 12-foot length each
Nylon material prevents fraying and tears during use
Lines are narrow for easy use and tying
cons: Black color can be difficult to see at night or in poor lighting

customer_reviews.title: Good strong lines, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for a weekend out on the Lake of the Ozarks, rented a slip and wanted extra dock lines. Ended up using these to keep the boat tied up all weekend in the slip just off the main channel. Anyone that's been down there on a holiday weekend knows it's more like being out on the open ocean with all the boats and wake. Kept my boat safe in the slip, no tearing or unraveling, and nice and long lines.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Reichert

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of dock lines I have purchased from Regatta Marine. They are truly made very well, the loop is more than long enough to fit any cleat and the ends are wrapped to prevent unwinding. If I need more, I will re-order.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Good lines for tying up you boat!
customer_reviews.text: These are attractive looking black lines. A good value at the price. There is an eye hole on the end which makes a quick task of looping the cleat. I use these on a 26’ cabin cruiser. They have held up extremely well over the last two months.
customer_reviews.author: Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Dockline
customer_reviews.text: Compare these to what you get at West Marine - you get four equal quality dock lines for the price of one. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chappy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible durability
customer_reviews.text: In a calm water bay marina, I expect my docklines to last me far longer than these did. After only a few weeks you could see the exterior sheathing rip and expose the inner line. After a month or two, the inner line was completely exposed, and not much longer the line snapped. I went through all four docklines in under 6 months. Completely ridiculous when previous lines have lasted whole years and were only replaced due to normal rotation. Do not waste your time with these lines.
customer_reviews.author: K. J. W. DDS

customer_reviews.title: Work as they are supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about this product. It works great. Looks great am happy with it. The reason for the 4 stars is because they are just used for travel docking so they aren't actually put to daily use. Very good quality and look geat with our white boat.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Economy line
customer_reviews.text: Looks like an economy line. Feels and handles like any other nylon double-braid. Only been using it as mooring line for two months. Still looks new. Really need six months and more to really rate.
customer_reviews.author: Mortimer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for 4 lines. Exactly what you’ll need for a smaller boat. I’m using with a 19’ bow rider and they’re perfect. Just pay attention to the item details when purchasing. That really goes for anything relating to on-line shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Jamey M. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: All good for me!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t worry about any bad reviews for these, they work great for me but I am just a weekend warrior. People who need their boats tied off for a long length of time should look for other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased a boat and needed some dock line and these are working great for our purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hegerty

customer_reviews.title: Nice package
customer_reviews.text: Good dock lines for the price, material feels a little slick out of the package but after a few uses it gets a more traditional rope feel. The loops are strong and the whipping on the end is holding up well. Holds a 20’ bay boat just fine and looks nice on the dock.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: needed a few more lines for the boat, seems to work fine, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Lines
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 20 Sea Ray and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Quality rope
customer_reviews.text: Great ropes! I actually bought another set for a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ornelas

customer_reviews.title: Great set is ropes
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Used them on a 19ft center console and not complaints.
customer_reviews.author: taryn mortier

customer_reviews.title: Great dock lines
customer_reviews.text: These dock lines are a nice quality. The package came just as seen, neat and tidy.
customer_reviews.author: my deco

customer_reviews.title: A good item at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the lines are black and so will hide soil. I think the length is good for most uses but might be a little short for “spring lines” on a 30 foot boat. A good purchase at a good price, and for the first time in 28 years, my dock lines all match!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lines-great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great docking lines. Dark colored so they don’t show the dirt.
customer_reviews.author: G. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Nice deal !
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Happy with quick shipping and the 4/pack. I hope they wear well!
customer_reviews.author: queenie

customer_reviews.title: Great Ropes
customer_reviews.text: This package of ropes were exactly what i needed to tie down in my slip. Just the right length.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust these lines to protect  your boat.
customer_reviews.text: Poor abrasion resistance. One of the lines wore through in the first relatively mild storm. The rest are chafed. My previous lines of same diameter had lasted years at the same dock without problems.
customer_reviews.author: WPD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great dock lines. The ends are nylon wrapped and are top quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dock lines
customer_reviews.text: They're nice and they seem to hold my boat at the dock.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: Good line
customer_reviews.text: Used to tie up bumper/fenders. Did the job well. Flexible, quality line.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ropes
customer_reviews.text: Nice ropes, I would recommend and buy again. I have them tied up to a 31' cabin cruiser and holding up good.
customer_reviews.author: Fishstick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tie downs
customer_reviews.text: The length is perfect the quality is high and knots don't slip.
customer_reviews.author: Todd White

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rope
customer_reviews.text: Great lines to launch boat and 2 ropes for tying boat to cleats
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good braided line with loop for a fair price suitable for an 18 foot boat or less
customer_reviews.author: privateer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: As listed. Best rope for your price. Using on my 18ft pontoon
customer_reviews.author: Robin Hilgenberg

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. They look good good quality I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Decent dock lines
customer_reviews.text: Great lines for a 19ft boat, use 2 to temporarily dock
customer_reviews.author: Shane G

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, value package of four ropes
customer_reviews.text: So far these ropes are aging well and great length for mooring 23 foot boat. Great to have four new ropes.
customer_reviews.author: Lance M Olson

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived on-time and in excellent condition. As for the product quality
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on-time and in excellent condition. As for the product quality, I was able to use the dock lines on my latest outing on the water and they worked great. they are soft and durable and held my boat (21 ft) in place easily.
customer_reviews.author: Name_witheld

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great. The black color helps them stand out from the other lines in my locker.
customer_reviews.author: Rockhound76

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality
customer_reviews.text: First trip snapped a line in half at dock. It was windy and quite a bit of chop at dock but the other and older lines did fine.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Dock Line
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in good condition as described. Good quality, no color bleeding.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Swidorski

customer_reviews.title: Broken line
customer_reviews.text: One line is broken and I can’t even return it because return window is passed by 10 days
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Raveendra

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely spliced. Quality whipping at the splice and on the end.
customer_reviews.author: Josh H.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Using to tie bow and stern lines in a berth. The spliced soft eye is cleanly made and very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dock lines at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These dock lines are great. I use them on my jon boat so I don't have to dry dock when the weather is nice. Measures to all the specs and is high quality. Nice that it comes in a pack of four I don't have to get ripped off by the local marina.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mount

customer_reviews.title: We are extremely happy with our purchase of the dock lines
customer_reviews.text: We are extremely happy with our purchase of the dock lines. We've been looking for awhile now to replace ours, and when we saw the price for a set of four we ordered them. Best price, great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M Smith

customer_reviews.title: Kink-proof
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed dock lines, do not kink. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lines
customer_reviews.text: These dock lines are fantastic. I had them tie off my boat in a rough dock area with two foot waves, and they help up very well.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Good delivery to my door.
customer_reviews.text: Soft feel. Strong enough to Moor a pontoon boat. Vary satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Nitsche

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Good quality, looks nice on my boat too.
customer_reviews.author: LMWX

product_meta.title: Heat Gun, 1600W Heavy Duty Hot Air Gun Kit, Variable Temperature Control with 2-Temp Settings 4 Nozzles 140℉~1112℉（60℃- 600℃）with Overload Protection for Crafts, Shrinking PVC, Stripping Paint
product_meta.description:
Color:YellowWhy Choose Coolwin Industrial Heat Gun with Display?

We selected high technology to improve the quality of the hot air gun, 
Which is different with most similar products in the market.

The many uses of the1600W Dual Temperature Heat Gun.
It’s a Versatile Tool for Stripping Paint and Varnish, Softening Caulking and Putty for Removal, Removing Adhesive Labels.
Thawing Pipes, Gutters, Freezers, or Radiators, Loosening Rusted Nuts and Bolts, Speed-Drying Epoxy, Cement, or any Damp Surface.
Reach for the Heat Gun to light your charcoal grill, warm RC engines to help with starting, and so much more.

-Stand the Heat Gun on its back for an Integrated Stand for Convenience
-Easy to Use design can be used with a single hand
-Two Deflector Nozzles, A reflector nozzle, and Air Reduction Nozzle are Included
Simply stand the unit up on the back side with the exhaust end pointed upward to cool or as a heat gun stand while you heat shrink wire insulators.

NOTE:
Do not operate power tools in explosive atmospheres, such as in the presence of flammable liquids,gases,or dust.

Power tools create sparks which may ignitethe dust or fumes.
feature_bullets: ▶ 【Strong Power With 2 Modes】1600W heat gun provides strong power quickly heat up to 1112℉(600℃) in seconds. Two modes: I: 60-450℃, 190-210L/min; II: 60-600℃, 250-500L/min, can satisfy all your utility.

▶ 【Variable Temp Control & Overload Protection】Unlike other dual temperature heat guns, our heat guns provide variable temperature control. The black dial provides rheostat-type heating, the high / low switch on its handle provides air flow control. Our heat gun also possess overload protector to avoid damaging your heat gun.

▶ 【ERGONOMIC & SAFETY】Ergonomic design for comfort and balance to reduce fatigue, integrated hands free support stand allows the gun sit upright for safe hand-free operation. With professional built-in overload protection prevents hot air gun from over heating due to misuse.

▶ 【Four Nozzles Accessories】Deflector nozzle directs a long, narrow heat pattern to the work surface; Two concentrator nozzles direct a concentrated heat flow to the work surface; Reflector nozzle disperses heat flow evenly around the whole work surface.

▶ 【WIDE APPLICATION】Ideal for varnish and paint removable (stripping paint), decorating, home improvement, upcycling, adhesives as well as thawing frozen pipes, shrinking PVC, loosening rusted bolts, bending plastics and much more.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,517 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
